title: Assad's Russian ties exposed by kids' holiday
text:
Assad's Russian ties exposed by kids' holiday 9:09am BST - 01:08 
The extent of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad's ties to Moscow have been further revealed after its emerged his teenage children vacationed at a Crimean summer camp last year. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The extent of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad's ties to Moscow have been further revealed after its emerged his teenage children vacationed at a Crimean summer camp last year.
